title: Tongari Boushi no Memole: Marielle no Housekibako
original_name: とんがり帽子のメモル マリエルの宝石箱
opening_song: "Tongari Boushi no Memoru" by Satoko Yamano
ending_song: "Tongari Boushi no Memole: Marielle no Housekiban" by Satoko Yamano
sinopse: Marielle is a young girl currently living in a remote house deep in the mountains between Switzerland and France to recover her health. The story is told through the memories of her adventures with Memoru, a tiny alien girl who lives on a nearby island. Her people are gnome-like beings who are stuck on Earth after their spaceship crashed here.
